description:
Get the free Paltalk app and meet new people with live group video chat! Sing live karaoke, listen to music, join a lively political debate or play group trivia — choose from thousands of live chat rooms with millions of members around the world!

Features:

TOTALLY FREE — Enjoy free live video chat over 3G, 4G, LTE or Wi-Fi.

PUBLIC CHAT ROOMS  — Browse 5,000 live chat rooms that cover thousands of topics.

PRIVATE CONVERSATIONS — Start private one-on-one text and video conversations with your pals from anywhere in the world.

UNLIMITED VIDEO — View an unlimited number of high-quality live video cams all at once.

PROFILES — Personalize your profile and express yourself with photos and bio.

VIRTUAL GIFTS — Send and receive virtual gifts from the Paltalk community and earn points toward achieving your Paltalk Crown. 

CROSS-PLATFORM — Works across smartphones, tablets and desktop. 

MULTITASKING — Want to read your email and continue to listen in on your favorite room? No problem, we support app backgrounding. #Tuneeeee
releaseNotes:
We listened to your feedback and are excited to provide this update. Here’s what’s new:

• Resolved issues with login and joining rooms
• Fixed newest message in the chat room from being blocked
• Added the ability to quickly re-enter a room within the Current Rooms category
• Added timestamps to your conversations

Our next release is even bigger so stay tuned.
